Issue.creator: smithbk
Issue.summary: Automatically generate TLS certificate for fabric-ca-server
Issue.description: A fabric CA server (both root and intermediate) should automatically generate a TLS certificate for itself by doing the functional equivalent of a "fabric-ca-client enroll --enrollment.profile tls" to itself; however, it should not need to send an HTTP request but should be done internally. The default expiration should be the same as for the CA cert of the server.
